mtshan 'phyong rgyas yar klungs su gtogs kyang gser ma gzhung du mi gtogs pas bsam yas chos skyong chen pos yar klungs gser ma gzhung gsung ba la brten nas ded dang lo tshod mnyam pa'i yar klungs chos rgyal pho brang ba'i sde pa yid bzhin nor bu yin pa 'dra zer /

do lkog byed ma shes pa 'di mi gseb tu mi 'gre ba 'dug bya skur bang gsum rnams skom 'dod chu khar 'dzom pas 'phral du ngo log rgya ri zhabs drung kar zhen ches bas 'then phyogs ci'ang mdzad kyang grong smad nas 'gro thengs gnyis pa'i thog zhal ngo bkra shis kyis thag bcad lha bya rtse bsgril gyi dpung yar stod nang du bcug pas 'phyong rgyas su ri bo bde chen pas thog drangs skya ser rnams kyis skya langs brgyab pa'i rdzong myur sprod kyi bskul mar song zhing /
